# RTX830 Basic Configuration Template
# Generated by rtxconfig

# Basic settings
console character ascii
console prompt {{ hostname }}
login password encrypted
login user {{ admin_user }} {{ admin_password }} administrator

# Network interface settings
ip lan1 address {{ lan1_ip }}/{{ lan1_subnet }}
ip pp enable

# SSH settings
ssh host key generate
ssh server host key enable
ssh user {{ admin_user }} password encrypted {{ admin_password }}

# Save configuration
save
